alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Red Lodge Foothills; Southern Big Horn; Southern Wheatland; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 3:46PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong winds from showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of Stillwater, western Big Horn, southeastern Wheatland, northwestern Carbon, southwestern Musselshell, western Yellowstone, Golden Valley and northeastern Sweet Grass Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 341 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong wind gusts along a line extending from Deadmans Basin Reservoir to 9 miles south of Absarokee. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 60 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Gusts over 50 mph were reported in Big Timber and Livingston with this activity. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Sudden strong wind gusts may arrive well ahead of precipitation or thunderstorms. Locations impacted include... Billings, Columbus, Roundup, Laurel, Joliet, Lockwood, Pryor, Absarokee, Broadview, Lavina, Halfbreed Lake Wildlife and Edgar. Any weak shower that pops up in this area will have the potential to produce locally strong wind gusts with little notice. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
